boxChanged.text: emitted when position or size changed

createElement.text: default implementation of element creation routine.

toScreen.text: map relative component coordinates to absolute screen ones

_updateAnimation.text: tries to set animation on name using css transitions, returns true on success

style.text: passes style (or styles { a:, b:, c: ... }) to underlying element

addChild.text: adds child, focus it if child accepts focus

_mapCSSAttribute.text: returns css rule by property name

forceActiveFocus.text: sets current global focus to component

_tryFocus.text: tries to focus children or item itself

_propagateFocusToParents.text: propagates focus to parent, if not set there

_focusTree.text: @private focus subtree of current focused child
